values.value: I hereby confirm the information provided throughout this application is accurate and true, to the best of my knowledge. I authorize the release of personal, financial, and/or academic information to organizations including, but not limited to, schools, employers, youth-serving organizations, and government agencies, for the purpose of determining income and programmatic eligibility. I am aware that I will be removed from the program immediately if I am found ineligible after enrollment and may be prosecuted for fraud and/or perjury. It is understood that the information obtained will be used only for purposes directly related to participation and eligibility for C2L-PHL youth programming.
